item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, May 5, 2025 at 5:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump says he does not know if he needs to uphold the US constitution
2. Trump’s ‘Marie Antoinette moment’: call for national sacrifice falls flat
3. Warren Buffett to step down from Berkshire Hathaway after six decades
4. [Opinion] The new White House influencer briefings are a terrible look
5. Americans want to move to Europe — but just how easy is it?
